name: Save new Sorry subscribers to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new subscriber is created in Sorry, Make will automatically add that subscriber to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LJh73lpF1_PoGcyf_MEWIiJ_jkvmXqqm2jm1LHIorNc/edit?usp=sharing).
